notes.title: Update
notes.text:
More than 20k unique users, thank you a lot for support!

- New feature - Whisper helper! Now you can send a trade message directly to the chat from browser. More info in notification's settings.
- Added sound alerts to overseer.
- Added invite button to scanner panel.
- Added new currency icons to notification panels.
- Auto-close notification now as option in settings.
- Fixed a bug when settings (like DND or max/min opacity) not saved properly.
